name: Employee Non Grata
description:
Employee Non Grata

You're the best candidate for the job! At least after you've lied on your resume!

Thankfully this job is nice and cushy, you shouldn't really have to do anything!

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Roll

Mouse + Click - Aim + Shoot

Space/Mouse - Progress Dialogue

F - Fullscreen

P - Switch to Regular Font

Assets Used:
Character Sprites - https://v3x3d.itch.io/bountiful-bits
Font (Pixel) - https://joebrogers.itch.io/bitpotion
Font (Regular) - https://www.dafont.com/lt-emphasis.font?sort=date&psize=s

Everything else is made by me using Godot and Aseprite.
